page.title: 15TRADE
page.content: {Ullesthorpe}Stores is a typical Village Store selling groceries,green groceries,frozen food and essntial domestic requirements as well as newspapers,magazines and periodicals which will be delivered upon request.As expected the prices are higher than one might find in a high street Supermarket,but one must pay for convenience and bulk buying is difficult.Mr&Mrs. Wilson run the stores.Mr.Henry Stevens runs the {butcher's shop.}He sells fresh meats,saugages and ham.He will provide large quanitities of meat as freezer packs if required.Mrs. Ashton owns Brenda's{hairdressing}salom.She has two part_time assistants and is open for 2\ days each week.Only ladies are catered for. Costs:Permanment wave from Â£6.50 to Â£11.50.Shampoo & set Â£1.85
